quiz.question: ____ mournfully
quiz.explanation: 悲伤地，悲伤地哭泣。The widow would weep mournfully at her husband's funeral. 寡妇会在丈夫的葬礼上悲伤地哭泣。

quiz.question: ____ blissfully
quiz.explanation: 幸福地，幸福地生活。The couple would live blissfully in their countryside cottage. 这对夫妇会在他们的乡村小屋里幸福地生活。

quiz.question: _____ fitfully
quiz.explanation: 断断续续地，断断续续地睡觉。The anxious student would sleep fitfully before the exam. 焦虑的学生会在考试前断断续续地睡觉。

quiz.question: ____ artfully
quiz.explanation: 巧妙地，巧妙地计划。The detective would plan artfully to catch the criminal. 侦探会巧妙地计划抓住罪犯。

quiz.question: ____ wistfully
quiz.explanation: 渴望地，渴望地叹气。She would sigh wistfully while looking at old photographs. 她会在看旧照片时渴望地叹气。

quiz.question: ____ playfully
quiz.explanation: 嬉戏地，嬉戏地玩耍。The kittens would play playfully with the ball of yarn. 小猫会嬉戏地玩毛线球。

quiz.question: ____ gully
quiz.explanation: 沟壑，深沟壑。The hikers had to cross a deep gully to reach the summit. 徒步旅行者必须穿过一个深沟壑才能到达山顶。

quiz.question: ___ foully
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙地，卑鄙地行动。The villain would act foully to achieve his goals. 恶棍会卑鄙地行动以达到他的目标。

quiz.question: ___ dimly
quiz.explanation: 模糊地，模糊地看见。In the fog, they could only see dimly ahead. 在雾中，他们只能模糊地看见前方。

quiz.question: ___ grimly
quiz.explanation: 严肃地，严肃地说。The doctor would say grimly that the prognosis was poor. 医生会严肃地说预后不佳。

quiz.question: ___ primly
quiz.explanation: 拘谨地，拘谨地坐着。The prim lady would sit primly with her hands folded. 拘谨的女士会拘谨地坐着，双手交叉。

quiz.question: ___ glumly
quiz.explanation: 忧郁地，忧郁地说。After losing the game, he would say glumly that they had no chance. 输掉比赛后，他会忧郁地说他们没有机会。

quiz.question: ____ cleanly
quiz.explanation: 干净地，干净地洗。The surgeon would wash cleanly before every operation. 外科医生会在每次手术前干净地洗手。

quiz.question: _______ keenly
quiz.explanation: 激烈地，激烈地竞争。The two teams would compete keenly for the championship. 两支球队会为冠军激烈地竞争。

quiz.question: _____ benignly
quiz.explanation: 和蔼地，和蔼地微笑。The grandmother would smile benignly at her grandchildren's antics. 祖母会和蔼地对孙子们的滑稽行为微笑。

quiz.question: ____ ungainly
quiz.explanation: 笨拙地，笨拙地移动。The young giraffe would move ungainly on its long legs. 小长颈鹿会用长腿笨拙地移动。

quiz.question: ___ vainly
quiz.explanation: 徒劳地，徒劳地尝试。He would try vainly to convince her to change her mind. 他会徒劳地试图说服她改变主意。

quiz.question: _____ solemnly
quiz.explanation: 庄严地，庄严地说话。The priest would speak solemnly during the wedding ceremony. 牧师会在婚礼仪式上庄严地说话。

quiz.question: ____ sternly
quiz.explanation: 严厉地，严厉地警告。The father would warn sternly his children not to play near the road. 父亲会严厉地警告孩子们不要在路边玩耍。

quiz.question: ____ limply
quiz.explanation: 无力地，无力地走。After the injury, he would walk limply for weeks. 受伤后，他会无力地走几个星期。

quiz.question: pimply ____
quiz.explanation: 长粉刺的，长粉刺的皮肤。The teenager was self-conscious about his pimply skin. 这个青少年对自己长粉刺的皮肤感到不自在。

quiz.question: ______ crisply
quiz.explanation: 干脆地，干脆地回答。The military officer would answer crisply to every question. 军官会干脆地回答每一个问题。

quiz.question: pearly ______
quiz.explanation: 珍珠般的，珍珠般的白牙。The model showed off her pearly whites in every photograph. 模特在每张照片中都展示她珍珠般的白牙。

quiz.question: ____ singularly
quiz.explanation: 独特地，独特地唱歌。The soprano would sing singularly beautiful high notes. 女高音会独特地唱出美妙的高音。

quiz.question: _____ soberly
quiz.explanation: 朴素地，朴素地打扮。For the funeral, everyone would dress soberly in dark colors. 参加葬礼时，每个人都会朴素地穿深色衣服。

quiz.question: ____ gingerly
quiz.explanation: 小心翼翼地，小心翼翼地迈步。She would step gingerly over the broken glass. 她会小心翼翼地迈过碎玻璃。

quiz.question: ___ improperly
quiz.explanation: 不恰当地，不恰当地行为。The employee was fired for acting improperly at the office party. 这名员工因在办公室聚会上不恰当地行为而被解雇。

quiz.question: ___ bitterly
quiz.explanation: 痛苦地，痛苦地哭泣。She would cry bitterly after hearing the bad news. 听到坏消息后，她会痛苦地哭泣。

quiz.question: burly _____
quiz.explanation: 魁梧的，魁梧的保安。A burly guard stood at the entrance to the nightclub. 一个魁梧的保安站在夜总会的入口处。

quiz.question: surly ________
quiz.explanation: 脾气暴躁的，脾气暴躁的态度。The waiter's surly attitude earned him few tips. 服务员脾气暴躁的态度让他几乎没有小费。

quiz.question: ___ sly
quiz.explanation: 狡猾的，狡猾地行动。The fox would act sly to steal the farmer's chickens. 狐狸会狡猾地行动偷农夫的鸡。

quiz.question: grisly ______
quiz.explanation: 恐怖的，恐怖的谋杀。The detective investigated the grisly murder scene. 侦探调查了恐怖的谋杀现场。

quiz.question: _____ tonelessly
quiz.explanation: 单调地，单调地说话。The depressed man would speak tonelessly without any inflection. 抑郁的男人会单调地说话，没有任何语调变化。

quiz.question: _____ pointlessly
quiz.explanation: 毫无意义地，毫无意义地争论。They would argue pointlessly for hours without reaching any conclusion. 他们会毫无意义地争论几个小时而得不出任何结论。

quiz.question: ___ listlessly
quiz.explanation: 无精打采地，无精打采地坐着。The bored student would sit listlessly through the lecture. 无聊的学生会无精打采地坐着听讲座。

quiz.question: ______ crossly
quiz.explanation: 生气地，生气地回答。When interrupted, she would answer crossly. 被打断时，她会生气地回答。

quiz.question: _____ raucously
quiz.explanation: 喧闹地，喧闹地笑。The crowd at the comedy show would laugh raucously. 喜剧表演的观众会喧闹地笑。

quiz.question: tremendously __________
quiz.explanation: 极其，极其成功。The new product launch was tremendously successful. 新产品发布会极其成功。

quiz.question: ______ viciously
quiz.explanation: 凶狠地，凶狠地攻击。The guard dog would attack viciously any intruder. 看门狗会凶狠地攻击任何入侵者。

quiz.question: _____ ferociously
quiz.explanation: 凶猛地，凶猛地咆哮。The bear would growl ferociously to protect its cubs. 熊会凶猛地咆哮以保护幼崽。

quiz.question: ___ unceremoniously
quiz.explanation: 无礼地，无礼地行动。The bouncer would act unceremoniously, throwing troublemakers out. 保镖会无礼地行动，把闹事者扔出去。

quiz.question: _____ sanctimoniously
quiz.explanation: 假装虔诚地，假装虔诚地说话。The hypocrite would speak sanctimoniously about morality. 伪君子会假装虔诚地谈论道德。

quiz.question: _______ precariously
quiz.explanation: 不稳定地，不稳定地平衡。The vase would balance precariously on the edge of the table. 花瓶会不稳定地平衡在桌子边缘。

quiz.question: _____ uproariously
quiz.explanation: 喧闹地，喧闹地笑。The audience would laugh uproariously at the comedian's jokes. 观众会对喜剧演员的笑话喧闹地笑。

quiz.question: variously _________
quiz.explanation: 各种各样地，各种各样地描述。The mysterious figure was variously described by witnesses. 神秘人物被目击者各种各样地描述。

quiz.question: _______ imperiously
quiz.explanation: 专横地，专横地命令。The queen would command imperiously her servants to obey. 女王会专横地命令她的仆人服从。

quiz.question: ____ laboriously
quiz.explanation: 费力地，费力地工作。The old man would work laboriously to complete the task. 老人会费力地工作以完成任务。

quiz.question: ___ curiously
quiz.explanation: 好奇地，好奇地问。The child would ask curiously about everything around her. 孩子会好奇地询问周围的一切。

quiz.question: _____ ostentatiously
quiz.explanation: 炫耀地，炫耀地打扮。The celebrity would dress ostentatiously to attract attention. 名人会炫耀地打扮以吸引注意力。

quiz.question: ___ surreptitiously
quiz.explanation: 偷偷摸摸地，偷偷摸摸地行动。The spy would act surreptitiously to avoid detection. 间谍会偷偷摸摸地行动以避免被发现。

quiz.question: _______ cautiously
quiz.explanation: 谨慎地，谨慎地前进。The explorers would proceed cautiously through the jungle. 探险者们会谨慎地穿过丛林。

quiz.question: ___ callously
quiz.explanation: 冷酷地，冷酷地行动。The criminal would act callously without any remorse. 罪犯会冷酷地行动而没有任何悔恨。

quiz.question: ___ incredulously
quiz.explanation: 怀疑地，怀疑地问。She would ask incredulously if the story was really true. 她会怀疑地问这个故事是否真的是真的。

quiz.question: _____ tremulously
quiz.explanation: 颤抖地，颤抖地说话。The nervous witness would speak tremulously on the stand. 紧张的证人会在证人席上颤抖地说话。

quiz.question: ____ venomously
quiz.explanation: 恶毒地，恶毒地发出嘶嘶声。The snake would hiss venomously at anyone who approached. 蛇会对任何接近的人恶毒地发出嘶嘶声。

quiz.question: _____ pompously
quiz.explanation: 自负地，自负地说话。The politician would speak pompously about his achievements. 政客会自负地谈论他的成就。

quiz.question: _______ rapturously
quiz.explanation: 狂喜地，狂喜地鼓掌。The audience would applaud rapturously after the performance. 观众会在表演结束后狂喜地鼓掌。

quiz.question: _____ riotously
quiz.explanation: 狂欢地，狂欢地聚会。The students would party riotously after exams ended. 学生们会在考试结束后狂欢地聚会。

quiz.question: ____ assiduously
quiz.explanation: 勤勉地，勤勉地工作。The scholar would work assiduously on his research project. 学者会勤勉地研究他的研究项目。

quiz.question: ____ sinuously
quiz.explanation: 蜿蜒地，蜿蜒地移动。The dancer would move sinuously across the stage. 舞者会蜿蜒地在舞台上移动。

quiz.question: _____ contemptuously
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑地，轻蔑地嘲笑。The bully would sneer contemptuously at weaker students. 恶霸会轻蔑地嘲笑较弱的学生。

quiz.question: ____ tortuously
quiz.explanation: 曲折地，曲折地蜿蜒。The mountain road would wind tortuously up the slope. 山路会曲折地蜿蜒上山坡。

quiz.question: _____ mischievously
quiz.explanation: 淘气地，淘气地微笑。The child would smile mischievously after hiding his sister's toy. 孩子藏起姐姐的玩具后会淘气地微笑。

quiz.question: _______ grievously
quiz.explanation: 严重地，严重地受伤。The soldier was grievously injured in combat. 士兵在战斗中严重地受伤。

quiz.question: ___ indistinctly
quiz.explanation: 不清楚地，不清楚地说。The mumbling patient would say indistinctly what hurt. 喃喃自语的病人会不清楚地说哪里疼。

quiz.question: ____ unsightly
quiz.explanation: 难看的，看起来难看。The abandoned building would look unsightly in the neighborhood. 废弃的建筑在社区里看起来难看。

quiz.question: _____ extravagantly
quiz.explanation: 奢侈地，奢侈地花费。The lottery winner would spend extravagantly on luxury items. 彩票中奖者会奢侈地花费在奢侈品上。

quiz.question: ______ defiantly
quiz.explanation: 挑衅地，挑衅地拒绝。The rebel would refuse defiantly to obey orders. 反叛者会挑衅地拒绝服从命令。

quiz.question: _____ jubilantly
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞地，欢欣鼓舞地欢呼。The fans would cheer jubilantly when their team won. 球迷们会在球队获胜时欢欣鼓舞地欢呼。

quiz.question: ______ petulantly
quiz.explanation: 任性地，任性地回答。The spoiled child would answer petulantly when denied candy. 被宠坏的孩子在被拒绝糖果时会任性地回答。

quiz.question: _______ indignantly
quiz.explanation: 愤慨地，愤慨地抗议。The accused man would protest indignantly his innocence. 被告会愤慨地抗议他的清白。

quiz.question: ____ exuberantly
quiz.explanation: 茂盛地，茂盛地生长。The tropical plants would grow exuberantly in the greenhouse. 热带植物会在温室里茂盛地生长。

quiz.question: ____ expectantly
quiz.explanation: 期待地，期待地等待。The children would wait expectantly for Santa Claus. 孩子们会期待地等待圣诞老人。

quiz.question: _____ complacently
quiz.explanation: 自满地，自满地微笑。The winner would smile complacently at his success. 获胜者会对他的成功自满地微笑。

quiz.question: _______ magnificently
quiz.explanation: 出色地，出色地表演。The orchestra would perform magnificently at the concert hall. 管弦乐队会在音乐厅出色地表演。

quiz.question: ___ innocently
quiz.explanation: 天真地，天真地行动。The child would act innocently, unaware of any wrongdoing. 孩子会天真地行动，不知道有任何错误。

quiz.question: ______ reminiscently
quiz.explanation: 怀旧地，怀旧地回忆。The elderly man would recall reminiscently his youth. 老人会怀旧地回忆他的青春。

quiz.question: ____ ardently
quiz.explanation: 热烈地，热烈地爱。Romeo would love ardently his Juliet. 罗密欧会热烈地爱着他的朱丽叶。

quiz.question: ____ obediently
quiz.explanation: 顺从地，顺从地服从。The trained dog would obey obediently every command. 训练有素的狗会顺从地服从每一个命令。

quiz.question: _____ insolently
quiz.explanation: 无礼地，无礼地说话。The rude teenager would speak insolently to his teachers. 粗鲁的青少年会对他的老师无礼地说话。

quiz.question: ___ reverently
quiz.explanation: 恭敬地，恭敬地鞠躬。The worshippers would bow reverently before the altar. 礼拜者会在祭坛前恭敬地鞠躬。

quiz.question: _____ absently
quiz.explanation: 心不在焉地，心不在焉地盯着。The distracted student would stare absently out the window. 心不在焉的学生会心不在焉地盯着窗外。

quiz.question: ______ intently
quiz.explanation: 专注地，专注地听。The students would listen intently to the professor's lecture. 学生们会专注地听教授的讲座。

quiz.question: __ inadvertently
quiz.explanation: 无意中，无意中做。She would do inadvertently reveal the secret. 她会无意中透露秘密。

quiz.question: ____ fervently
quiz.explanation: 热切地，热切地祈祷。The desperate man would pray fervently for a miracle. 绝望的男人会热切地祈祷奇迹。

quiz.question: _______ faintly
quiz.explanation: 微弱地，微弱地呼吸。The injured person would breathe faintly after the accident. 受伤的人在事故后会微弱地呼吸。

quiz.question: saintly ________
quiz.explanation: 圣人般的，圣人般的耐心。The teacher showed saintly patience with difficult students. 老师对困难学生表现出圣人般的耐心。

quiz.question: _____ hotly
quiz.explanation: 激烈地，激烈地争论。The lawyers would argue hotly in the courtroom. 律师们会在法庭上激烈地争论。

quiz.question: ______ tartly
quiz.explanation: 尖刻地，尖刻地回答。She would answer tartly to any foolish question. 她会尖刻地回答任何愚蠢的问题。

quiz.question: ___ covertly
quiz.explanation: 秘密地，秘密地行动。The undercover agent would act covertly to gather intelligence. 卧底特工会秘密地行动收集情报。

quiz.question: portly _________
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的，肥胖的绅士。A portly gentleman in a fine suit entered the restaurant. 一位穿着考究西装的肥胖的绅士走进了餐厅。

quiz.question: _____ curtly
quiz.explanation: 简短无礼地，简短无礼地回答。The busy executive would reply curtly to interruptions. 忙碌的高管会对打扰简短无礼地回答。

quiz.question: ghastly _____
quiz.explanation: 可怕的，可怕的场景。The paramedics arrived at the ghastly scene of the accident. 急救人员到达了事故的可怕的场景。

quiz.question: bristly _____
quiz.explanation: 多刺的，多刺的胡须。The old sailor had a rough, bristly beard. 老水手有粗糙多刺的胡须。

quiz.question: ghostly ______
quiz.explanation: 幽灵般的，幽灵般的身影。A ghostly figure appeared in the haunted mansion. 幽灵般的身影出现在闹鬼的豪宅里。

quiz.question: ______ stoutly
quiz.explanation: 坚决地，坚决地抵抗。The defenders would resist stoutly against the invaders. 守卫者会坚决地抵抗入侵者。

quiz.question: ____ lowly
quiz.explanation: 卑微的，卑微地出生。Despite being born lowly, he rose to great heights. 尽管卑微地出生，他还是达到了很高的地位。

quiz.question: _____ slyly
quiz.explanation: 狡猾地，狡猾地微笑。The cunning fox would smile slyly at his clever plan. 狡猾的狐狸会对他的聪明计划狡猾地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ wryly
quiz.explanation: 苦笑地，苦笑地微笑。He would smile wryly at the irony of the situation. 他会对这种情况的讽刺意味苦笑地微笑。

quiz.question: steamy ________
quiz.explanation: 充满蒸汽的，充满蒸汽的浴室。After the hot shower, the steamy bathroom mirror was foggy. 洗完热水澡后，充满蒸汽的浴室镜子变得模糊了。
